content.text:
# Draft:Downward (band)

----
Downward is an American alternative rock band from Tulsa, Oklahoma. Formed in late 2015 by a group of school friends, the band went through several lineup changes before settling into their four-member lineup: Drew Richardson (guitar, vocals), Hunter Senft (guitar), Severin Olsen (bass), and Tollie Pugh (drums). They have released several records through New Mortality Zine and gained recognition for their dynamic live performances, including a session on [https://audiotree.tv/session/downward Audiotree Live.]
Discography
Albums
* Downward (LP1), December 2018
* Downward (LP2), March 2025
EPs
* The Brass Tax, February 2022
* Split with trauma ray, October 2023
Singles
* Gehenna/Evaporate, December 2018
* Your Way, May 2020
* Leechy, May 2020
* Real Green Dollars, February 2022
* Line (alt), March 2022
Touring
In 2025, they joined Movements, Citizen, and Scowl on their North American tour, solidifying their presence in the alternative music scene.
References
